questions: Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I just got called into my boss's office for a meeting tomorrow with no agenda. What could that be about?
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I'm waiting on biopsy results and the doctor said they'd call within a week. It's been eight days.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My presentation to the board is in two hours and I just realized one of my key data points might be wrong.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I sent a risky text to someone I'm dating and they haven't responded in three days.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My company just announced a round of layoffs and my team hasn't heard anything yet.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I have a final exam tomorrow and I've barely covered half the material.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My landlord said he needs to talk to me about the lease when I get home tonight.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I just noticed a weird charge on my credit card and I can't reach the bank until Monday.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My flight leaves in 90 minutes and I'm stuck in traffic that isn't moving.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I have to give a toast at my best friend's wedding this weekend and I'm terrible at public speaking.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My kid's school called and said I need to come in for a meeting with the principal.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I submitted my tax return last month and just got a letter from the IRS.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I'm about to start a new job and I'm not sure I actually have the skills they think I do.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. My check engine light just came on and I'm 200 miles from home on a highway at night.
Stay calm and matter-of-fact. I accidentally replied-all to a company-wide email with something I meant to send privately.
